package.name: Zoom for YouTube
package.shortDescription: Compatible with: iPhone X, iPhone Xs, iPhone Xs Max, iPhone Xr. iOS 11.0-13.2.3

descriptionlist.description: This tweak changes the values for YouTube's "Zoom To Fill" feature, to zoom just up to about 18:9 aspect ratio, which is right up to the notch.
It also gives you the option to zoom in by default, with/out the zoom to 18:9 aspect ratio limit.
Report any bugs/problems in the bug report button down below, or in the tweak settings.

changelog.change: You can now use the "Zoom by default" feature to zoom in by default even without limiting the zoom to 18:9 aspect ratio.
